mapper.select: SELECT DT.EMPL_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN CC.UPPER_CMMN_CODE = '00' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS bad, SUM(CASE WHEN CC.UPPER_CMMN_CODE = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS work, SUM(CASE WHEN CC.UPPER_CMMN_CODE = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vacation, SUM(CASE WHEN CC.UPPER_CMMN_CODE = '30' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BUSINESS_TRIP FROM DCLZ_TYPE DT LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON DT.DCLZ_CODE = CC.CMMN_CODE WHERE DT.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} GROUP BY DT.EMPL_NO

WITH U AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY D.dclz_no DESC) RNUM , D.EMPL_NO , D.DCLZ_NO , D.DCLZ_CODE , D.DCLZ_BEGIN_DT , D.DCLZ_END_DT , D.cmmn_code_nm ,TO_CHAR(D.dclz_begin_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_begin_time ,TO_CHAR(D.dclz_end_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_end_time ,TO_CHAR(D.dclz_end_dt, 'YYYY-mm-DD') as work_begin_date ,TO_CHAR(D.dclz_end_dt, 'YYYY-mm-DD') as work_end_date FROM ( SELECT dt.EMPL_NO, dt.DCLZ_NO, dt.DCLZ_CODE, dt.DCLZ_BEGIN_DT, dt.DCLZ_END_DT, cc.cmmn_code_nm FROM dclz_type dt RIGHT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON dt.dclz_code = cc.cmmn_code WHERE cmmn_code_group='ATTEND' AND EMPL_NO=#{emplNo} )D ) SELECT U.* FROM U WHERE U.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * #{size})-(#{size}-#{currentPage}) AND (#{currentPage}* #{size})

SELECT cc.cmmn_code, dt.empl_no, cc.cmmn_code_nm, COUNT(empl_no) AS cnt, cc.upper_cmmn_code FROM common_code cc LEFT JOIN DCLZ_TYPE dt ON(cc.cmmn_code = dt.dclz_code AND dt.empl_no = #{emplNo}) WHERE cmmn_code_group='ATTEND' GROUP BY cc.cmmn_code_nm, dt.empl_no, cc.upper_cmmn_code, cc.cmmn_code ORDER BY cc.cmmn_code

SELECT TO_CHAR(dclz_begin_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as today_work_start_time ,TO_CHAR(dclz_end_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as today_work_end_time FROM dclz_type WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND dclz_code = #{dclzCode} AND dclz_no = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYmmDD')

WITH U AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY D.dclz_no DESC) RNUM , D.EMPL_NO, D.DCLZ_NO, D.DCLZ_CODE, D.work_begin_time, D.work_end_time, D.cmmn_code_nm FROM ( SELECT dt.empl_no ,dt.dclz_no ,dt.dclz_code ,TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_begin_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_begin_time ,TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_end_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_end_time ,cc.cmmn_code_nm FROM dclz_type dt RIGHT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON dt.dclz_code = cc.cmmn_code WHERE cmmn_code_group='ATTEND' AND dt.empl_no = #{emplNo} AND (TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_begin_dt, 'YYYY') LIKE #{workBeginDate}) ) D ) SELECT U.* FROM U WHERE U.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10)-(10-#{currentPage}) AND (#{currentPage}* 10)

WITH U AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY D.dclz_no DESC) RNUM , D.EMPL_NO, D.DCLZ_NO, D.DCLZ_CODE, D.work_begin_time, D.work_end_time, D.cmmn_code_nm FROM ( SELECT dt.empl_no ,dt.dclz_no ,dt.dclz_code ,TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_begin_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_begin_time ,TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_end_dt, 'HH24:MI:SS') as work_end_time ,cc.cmmn_code_nm FROM dclz_type dt RIGHT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON dt.dclz_code = cc.cmmn_code WHERE cmmn_code_group='ATTEND' AND dt.empl_no = #{emplNo} AND (TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_begin_dt, 'YYYY') LIKE #{workBeginDate}) AND (TO_CHAR(dt.dclz_end_dt, 'mm') LIKE #{workEndDate}) ) D ) SELECT U.* FROM U WHERE U.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10)-(10-#{currentPage}) AND (#{currentPage}* 10)

SELECT v.EMPL_NO , v.YRYC_YEAR , v.YRYC_USE_BEGIN_DATE , v.YRYC_USE_END_DATE , v.TOT_YRYC_DAYCNT , v.YRYC_USE_DAYCNT , v.YRYC_MDAT_DAYCNT , v.YRYC_REMNDR_DAYCNT , v.EXCESS_WORK_YRYC , v.CMPNSTN_YRYC , emp.empl_nm FROM vacation v, employee emp WHERE v.empl_no = emp.empl_no AND v.empl_no = #{emplNo} ANd v.yryc_year = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')
